settings.title: immerse into the world of COLDFIRE!
settings.content: COLDFIRE is a synonym for dedication, experience, passion and attention to the finest detail. Exquisitely crafted with a unique blend of ultimate-grade materials, our products are designed to withstand and match the extreme lifestyle inspired by your untamed rebel spirit, while protecting your electronic data in a way that lets you unleash it to the fullest.

settings.title: COLDFIRE | TACTICAL EVERYDAY CARRY
settings.content: WE SELL PASSION, NOT FASHION – In a world full of trendy and expensive brands, that only scream “I’m rich”, we cater for the rebellious souls who exclude themselves from the mainstream. If your personality says “I am a pro” and you're looking for something different and inspirational, our unique products with a distinctive look and feel, defined by the idea of tactical everyday excellence, are the best fit for you. Exquisitely crafted with a unique blend of high performance ultimate-grade materials, our wallets, cardholders, travel wallets, bags and accessories are designed to withstand and match the extreme lifestyle inspired by your untamed rebel spirit, while protecting your electronic RFID data in a way that lets you unleash it to the fullest. COLDFIRE will make sure you enjoy the best of both worlds.

settings.password_message: SUBSCRIBE NOW AND GET 15% OFF AS SOON AS WE OPEN

settings.newsletter_text: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …

settings.title: Wallets
settings.subtitle:
Walk on the wildside
with our tactical-grade wallets.

settings.title: GT REBEL | CARBON FIBER MEN'S ACCESSORIES | COLLECTION
settings.content: An unique blend of CARBITEX's Best-in-Class CX6 Carbon fiber, performance Kangaroo leather and ultimate-grade materials fused to perfection in a stylish, yet tough RFID-protected everyday carry.

settings.title: The game changer
settings.text: COLDFIRE offers unique products, defined by the idea of tactical everyday excellence. We fuse materials unmatched in strength and resilience to create tough RFID-protected carry with a distinctive look and feel. Our trendsetting ingredients include CARBITEX’s Best-in-Class CX6™ Carbon fiber and performance kangaroo leather ensuring ultimate durability and style, Dyneema®-reinforced lining and military-grade threads for a tear-free experience, our RFID Data Armor™ providing you with a peace of mind, and a signature logo plate exquisitely crafted from aerospace grade TITANIUM – a finishing touch that sets you apart from the crowd. Whether you are on business, or conquering the next extreme challenge, COLDFIRE will make sure you enjoy the best of both worlds!

settings.title: Best-in-class
settings.text:
CARBITEX CX6™ CARBON FIBER 

Thanks to its unique microscopic crystalline structure, Carbon fiber has the highest tensile strength of any commercially available fiber. It is composed mostly of carbon atoms that are bound together in microscopic crystals which are linearly aligned and parallel to the long axis of the fibers. CX6™ is an exceptionally flexible reinvention of Carbon fiber allowing the utilization of its unmatched tensile strength in soft applications, such as footwear, sports equipment and travel accessories. Strong, lightweight and striking, CX6™ provides increased performance and modern aesthetic which is bold, yet elegant. We chose CX6™ for its supreme qualities in our mission to provide you with sleek and virtually indestructible high-tech accessories suitable for any occasion.

Find out more at: CARBITEX

settings.title: Light and strong
settings.text:
PACKER LEATHER - KANGAROO PERFORMANCE LEATHER

Kangaroo leather is weight for weight the strongest and lightest leather available, which is also extremely soft to the touch. It is derived from the hide of the kangaroo, known for its one-of-a-kind fiber structure with slim to none fat content. Unlike other raw materials requiring heavy splitting and shaving which reduces their physical performance, kangaroo leather is naturally thin and retains all its strength. These unique properties are further enhanced by Packer Leather’s innovative technologies to provide a versatile, ultra-strong and lightweight natural material, which is highly-breathable, water repellent and abrasion resistant.

Find out more at: PACKERLEATHER

settings.title: No more tears
settings.text:
COLDFIRE RFID DATA ARMOR™

Today's increasingly digital world offers endless possibilities. Unfortunately, some of us explore them in a harmful manner, leaving the rest of us at a constant threat of impersonation and data fraud through RFID skimming – a digital theft allowing the data stored on RFID chips to be read and downloaded from a distance using a reader device. Arе you worried yet?! Don’t be… COLDFIRE provides utmost security. Our built-in RFID Data Armor™ encompasses Cryptalloy foil and RFID shielding/EMF blocking fabric to ensure a safe solution against electronic pickpockets. All your personal data and payment cards are kept secure so you can enjoy a worry-free experience at all times.

settings.content:
DYNEEMA®
Ensuring uncompromising durability was one of the important milestones on our way to tactical everyday excellence. Our striving to perfection led us to Dyneema® – a tough, durable and extremely versatile fiber that is 15 times stronger than steel. Made from Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene (UHMW-PE), Dyneema® is ultra-tough due to a patented processing technology, involving drawing, heating, elongating and cooling of the fibers. The result is a lightweight, high-performance material – a proud bearer of the title the world’s strongest fiber.
Find out more at: DYNEEMA 

TITANIUM Ti 6-4
The finishing touch that completes the style of our tactical everyday carry is a signature logo plate crafted from Ti 6-4 – an aerospace-grade Titanium alloy which is 30% stronger, yet 50% lighter than steel. Possessing extreme tensile strength and toughness, this lightweight material has extraordinary corrosion resistance and ability to withstand extreme temperatures. Widely used in aerospace and industrial applications, such as jet engines, power generation and automotive industry, Ti 6-4 is now an inseparable part of COLDFIRE making a firm statement of perfection.

TUNGSTEN
Our Signature All-Terrain Organizer is finished off with a COLDFIRE-branded zip puller crafted from Tungsten – a strong and durable natural element, known for its high corrosion resistance, unmatched tensile strength and high melting point. With a fracture resistance higher than a diamond’s, hardness bigger than steel’s and high density, Tungsten is a preferred material in various applications, including military – which made it the perfect ingredient for fulfilling the vision of our flagship tactical everyday carry, while staying true to our principle of paying attention to the finest detail.

settings.title: Organizers & Travel
settings.subtitle:
Work, play & travel in style
with our unique blend,
top-of-the-line
organizing carry.

settings.title: Cardholders
settings.subtitle:
Store your essentials securely, 
while standing out from the crowd,
with our game-changing cardholders.

settings.title: Accessories
settings.subtitle:
Complement your style
with our trend setting accessories.
